Class DenseVector<E>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.vectors.DenseVector<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of scalar elements
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vector<E>, AbelianGroup<Vector<E>>, AbelianMonoid<Vector<E>>, Group<Vector<E>>, Magma<Vector<E>>, Monoid<Vector<E>>, Set<Vector<E>>, Module<Vector<E>, E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Vector3D
public class DenseVector<E> extends Object implements Vector<E>
A dense vector implementation backed by a list.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      Description copied from interface: Magma
      Performs the binary operation on two elements.

      Properties: None required (not necessarily associative or commutative)

    • inverse

      public Vector<E> inverse(Vector<E> element)
      Description copied from interface: Group
      Returns the inverse of the given element.

      For element a, returns a⁻¹ such that: a ∗ a⁻¹ = a⁻¹ ∗ a = e (identity).

      Specified by:
      inverse in interface Group<E>
      Parameters:
      element - the element to invert
      Returns:
